name: 4th International Conference on NLP & Big Data
content: 4th International Conference on NLP & Big Data (NLPD 2023) Hybrid -- Registered authors can present their work online or face to face. Scope & Topics 4th International Conference on NLP & Big Data (NLPD 2023) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications of Natural Language Computing and Big data. Authors are solicited to contribute to the conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the following areas, but are not limited to these topics only.
